item.title: Rearranging an Array: Transforming arr[i] into arr[arr[i]]
item.description: Introduction Aspiring software developers and computer science engineering enthusiasts often encounter captivating challenges that put their problem-solving abilities to the test. In this beginner’s guide to data structures and algorithms, we delve into a fascinating problem involving arrays. We will explore a step-by-step solution to rearrange the elements in the input array, leading to a transformation where each element at index i becomes the value at index arr[i]. The Problem Let’s consider the problem statement:
